svg.aria-label: Illustrative terminal screenshot: top edge deployment recommendations for HOTFormerLoc

text.font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial

svg.text: recommendations • HOTFormerLoc edge deployment • ranked by impact

g.font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

text.tspan: > Analyse HOTFormerLoc for edge deployment. Provide the top 3 recommendations. Cite file paths.
1) Add AMP/FP16 inference toggles + a benchmark harness (eval/pnv_evaluate.py + misc/bench)
Expected win: quick latency drop with minimal accuracy impact; easy A/B comparison
2) Add an export path (TorchScript/ONNX) and measure edge runtimes (TensorRT / ONNX Runtime)
Watch-outs: custom ops (libs/dwconv); keep a safe fallback path for deployment
3) Reduce preproc + memory pressure: tune octree build, point sampling, and batch construction
Keep accuracy via eval gate (recall@1) on a fixed subset; prefer reversible config knobs
• edge benchmark gate: p95 latency ≤ target, peak memory ≤ budget (device: Jetson / small x86)
• accuracy gate: recall@1 / recall@5 delta within threshold on a fixed subset (same seeds)
• export path may be brittle on edge (mitigate: keep a PyTorch+AMP deployment mode)
• accuracy regression via aggressive downsampling (mitigate: gate + sweep configs)
keep changes flag-gated; revert one PR if edge metrics regress
